Name: [Assist] Backup Shield Generator
Desc: Triggering Perfect Assist grants the Agent a Shield equal to <color=#2BAD00>6%</color> of their Max HP for 10s.
Desc2: A portable shield generatorÂ that sacrifices some of its protection for portability. Since it only provides a very limited level of protection, some would even say you get about as much protection as picking up a trash can lid.
